description.value:
Elves and ryphorians mix on @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.setting.sRunEYMfbrHeHcl7]{Triaxus}. Half-ryphorians can have summerborn or winterborn ryphorian features. These halfelves have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.races.K7OFZY7hnnKZQ8YY]{Elf} and ryphorian subtypes, but no @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.races.AMBcyDZDtJ1OOzh3]{Human} subtype. They also gain resistance 2 to cold and fire, which stacks with one other form of resistance. In conditions of severe cold or heat, they must attempt Fortitude saves only once per hour instead of once every 10 minutes.

This replaces adaptability.

System does not currently support stacked Energy Resistance bonuses. Emulate stacking by editing the modifiers in the Modifier tab.
